Title: Relates to prohibiting charges for the issuance of a certificate of still birth or fetal death
Summary: Prohibits charging a fee for the issuance of a certificate of still birth or pregnancy loss; repeals certain provisions of law relating thereto.
LawCode: Amd §§4160-a & 4161, rpld §4160 sub 6, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting charges for the issuance of a certificate of still birth or pregnancy loss; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
